name: RUUT Technologies, Inc
description: Developer of an investment platform intended to bridge the gap between Mexicans with a digital banking account and people with a personal investment account for non-investors. The company offers a simple, intuitive, and commission-free beginner-friendly product, with investment advisory, newsfeed, and an impact investment tracker, enabling investors with a simple, low-cost, and long-term holding incentive structure.

name: Kfit Holdings
description: Provider of a fitness and leisure platform designed to offer a range of consumer goods and services. The company's platform connects consumers to spa, health and fitness, food and other deal providers to make fitness and other services more accessible to its users so that they can obtain an all-access membership, enabling them to build their own fitness and spa schedule by choosing from many classes and activities in their cities.
